Question.Subject: How do i email an excel attachment to more than one email-id individually (like in mail-merge)?
Question.Content: I need to send an important excel file to my business associates individually but as in mail-merge.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Open yr excel file and click on File menu the select send to mail recipient or mail recipient as attatchment before this u configure ur mail id with outlook or a wizard come to configure to outlook this option send ur excel file to one or many recipeint

Answer.Content: Open yr excel file and click on File menu the select send to mail recipient or mail recipient as attatchment before this u configure ur mail id with outlook or a wizard come to configure to outlook this option send ur excel file to one or many recipeint
